START_MESSAGE:
Hello! I can look up words for you using WordsAPI. 
Type a word and I'll give you its definition

Use /help to see available commands

By Danil Petrov
HELP_MESSAGE:
I can help you find definitions of words.
- Type a word directly to get its definition.
- After getting a definition, use the 'More details' button for origin, synonyms and more.
Commands:
/lang en - Change language to English
/lang ru - Сменить язык на русский
/help - Show this help message

By Danil Petrov
WORD_NOT_FOUND: I couldn't find this word or phrase
NO_DEFINITIONS_FOUND: The word exists but this dictionary does not provide its definition
